Tastebudz Mimosa Strain Autoflower Seeds: The Classic Sparkling Cocktail
Genetic Lineage: Lemon Haze Auto x Orange Punch

🧬 Genetic Fusion: The Mimosa Weed strain is Crafted from a combination of two iconic citrus powerhouses – orange punch strain and lemon haze auto  – Tastebudz Mimosa strain boasts unbeatable genetics and an explosive taste of lemonade and orange tart that’ll have your senses singing with every puff.

🌿 Balanced Experience: With a 70% sativa and 30% indica blend, this strain delivers a powerful and uplifting cerebral experience that’s perfect for combating pain and fatigue.

🌱 Versatile Growth: At 80-100 cm tall, Mimosa thrives both indoors and outdoors, with a flowering time of just 50-80 days. And with a generous yield of 500-600 g/m², you can enjoy the enticing aroma of orange zest and lemonade for days on end.

🍯Terpenes: Alpha Pinene / Myrcene / Humele / Delta 3 Carene / Linalool / Caryophyllene oxide / Beta Pinene / Limonene / Caryophyllene

📜Please note that Tastebudz Mimosa Autoflowering Cannabis Seeds are sold as souvenirs only in accordance with U.K laws.

⭐Highly Rated – So don’t settle for just any feminized cannabis seeds – choose Tastebudz Mimosa feminized seeds and experience the ultimate in flavour, potency, and satisfaction. Whether you’re a veteran smoker or a newbie to the game, this strain is an absolute must-try!

🌍 Tastebudz Mimosa Auto seeds are available from Seedbanks worldwide – Click here to find a distributor near you!

Description:

Elevate your cannabis journey with Tastebudz Mimosa Strain Autoflower Seeds. A true delight for enthusiasts seeking a burst of flavour and invigorating effects. Born from the fusion of Orange Punch and Lemon Haze Auto, this strain boasts exceptional genetics and a taste that ignites your senses. Its 70% sativa and 30% indica blend delivers a powerful cerebral experience, making it a superb choice for alleviating pain and fatigue.

Flavour & Aroma Of Our Mimosa Strain:

Prepare to savour a symphony of flavours with our Mimosa Strain. Inhale the explosion of lemonade and orange tart that dances on your taste buds. This strain delivers an unforgettable citrusy delight that adds a burst of sunshine to your cannabis experience.

What Strain Is Mimosa Auto?

Mimosa Auto is a captivating hybrid strain crafted from the genetic fusion of Orange punch and Lemon Haze Auto. This combination results in a balanced yet potent strain that offers the best of both worlds, making it a versatile choice for connoisseurs and newcomers alike.

Potency & Effects:

Experience the potency of the Mimosa strain with its 70% sativa genetics. It delivers an uplifting and cerebral high that’s perfect for combating pain and fatigue. Let the soothing effects wash over you, leaving you feeling invigorated and refreshed.

Cultivation Of Mimosa Strain:

Growing Mimosa Strain is a rewarding experience for cultivators of all levels. With a manageable height, both indoor and outdoor growers can thrive. It boasts a short flowering time of 50-80 days and yields generously with 500-600 g/m². Cultivate your own Mimosa garden and enjoy the enticing aroma of this citrusy sensation.

Legal Note:

Please be mindful that Tastebudz Mimosa Strain Autoflower Seeds are sold as collectible souvenirs only, in strict accordance with cannabis seeds UK laws. Cherish these seeds as tokens of your cannabis journey and explore the delightful world of Mimosa..

🚚 Free U.K Shipping over £50 With International Options Available

🍋 Tastebudz Mimosa Strain – Where Flavour Meets Sunshine!🍊

Discover the perfect smoke for any time of day with Tastebudz Mimosa Bud. Crafted from the fusion of the Potent Orange Punch Strain and all-time favourite – Super Lemon Haze Auto! the Mimosa Cannabis strain offers unbeatable genetics and an explosion of lemonade and orange tart flavours. With a 70% sativa and 30% indica blend, it delivers a potent, uplifting cerebral experience ideal for alleviating pain and fatigue. 

Enjoy its therapeutic qualities, relaxing without feeling narcotic. Expect dense, lemon-tinged buds and a taste of the classic sparkling cocktail with abundant trichomes and THC levels of 20%. Sold as souvenirs in accordance with cannabis seeds UK. laws.
